title: Test
text: #摘要 We find that the adsorption of atomic nitrogen is strongly related to the d-band center, and the adsorption sequence is as same as the d-band center order.Besides, the dissociation barriers of \ce{N2} have correlation with the adsorption of atomic nitrogen. we find that the lower adsorption energy is, the lower dissociation barriers of \ce{N2} is, because the lower adsorption energy means the stronger interaction between the adsorbate and surface.Finally, the dissociation barriers and reaction energies of \ce{N2} molecule on strained 2H and various novel crystal phases are calculated, where the former conform the Br$\emptyset$onsted-Evans-Polanyi relationship and the later breaks it.Therefore, a certain strain with the cooperation of crystal phase can be a better method to modulate nitrogen decomposition. We find that the adsorption of atomic nitrogen is strongly related to the d-band center, and the adsorption sequence is as same as the d-band center order.Besides, the dissociation barriers of \ce{N2} have correlation with the adsorption of atomic nitrogen.we find that the lower adsorption energy is, the lower dissociation barriers of \ce{N2} is, because the lower adsorption energy means the stronger interaction between the adsorbate and surface.Finally, the dissociation barriers and reaction energies of \ce{N2} molecule on strained 2H and various novel crystal phases are calculated, where the former conform the Br$\emptyset$onsted-Evans-Polanyi relationship and the later breaks it.Therefore, a certain strain with the cooperation of crystal phase can be a better method to modulate nitrogen decomposition.We find that the adsorption of atomic nitrogen is strongly related to the d-band center, and the adsorption sequence is as same as the d-band center order.Besides, the dissociation barriers of \ce{N2} have correlation with the adsorption of atomic nitrogen.we find that the lower adsorption energy is, the lower dissociation barriers of \ce{N2} is, because the lower adsorption energy means the stronger interaction between the adsorbate and surface.Finally, the dissociation barriers and reaction energies of \ce{N2} molecule on strained 2H and various novel crystal phases are calculated, where the former conform the Br$\emptyset$onsted-Evans-Polanyi relationship and the later breaks it.Therefore, a certain strain with the cooperation of crystal phase can be a better method to modulate nitrogen decomposition.

title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
